meanings.sent1: The bimetallic watch had a silver and gold band.
meanings.sent2: The bimetallic coin was made of copper and nickel.
meanings.sent3: The bimetallic spoon confused the robot chef.
meanings.sent4: Her bimetallic personality shone through in her diverse interests.
meanings.sent5: The bimetallic bridge connected the two sides of the river.

meanings.definition: Involving the use of two different metals.
meanings.sent1: The bimetallic wire combined copper and aluminum.
meanings.sent2: The bimetallic pipe was a mix of steel and brass.
meanings.sent3: The bimetallic door handle puzzled the locksmith.
meanings.sent4: Their bimetallic partnership brought together unique skills.
meanings.sent5: The bimetallic key opened both the silver and gold locks.
